quotes.text: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.comment: A famous line pondering the nature of existence.

quotes.author: René Descartes
quotes.comment: A fundamental element of Western philosophical thought.

quotes.author: René Descartes
quotes.comment: The original Latin version of 'I think, therefore I am.'

quotes.author: Popeye
quotes.comment: Popeye's humorous pronunciation of 'I am what I am.'
